text: Abdullah Doğan (born 10 February 1997) is a Turkish footballer who plays as a right winger or offensive midfielder for TB Uphusen. ==Career== After playing for SGO Bremen and TuS Komet Arsten, Doğan moved to the youth team of Werder Bremen. After being selected by the coach of the reserve team, Alexander Nouri, to join the squad, he made his 3. Liga debut on 12 March 2016 in a 0–1 loss against Rot-Weiß Erfurt coming as a substitute for Enis Bytyqi in the 67th minute. ==References== ==External links== * * Abdullah Doğan at FuPa Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Turkish footballers Category:German people of Turkish descent Category:Association football forwards Category:SV Werder Bremen II players Category:BSV Schwarz-Weiß Rehden players Category:FC Oberneuland players Category:3. Liga players
title: Abdullah Doğan
